backend/main.mo: Actor providing contact form submission, admin-only retrieval of contact requests, and user profile CRUD with AccessControl-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a landing page hero image update to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering styles, components, configuration, and assets.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration enabling inclusion of the .well-known directory.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, fonts, and root div for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain configuration file listing approved domains for the app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing major crawlers full access to all paths.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing the full landing page sections in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section presenting business description, trust indicators, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form component posting directly to Formspree with required name, email, phone, and message fields.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section combining the contact form with business details and social links.
Features section listing four service highlights with icons and a CTA linking to YouTube.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a dynamic year plus attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, CTA buttons, and a scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, scroll-based styling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Section that loads and displays a Calendly widget after clicking a booking button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContactReque: Empty placeholder file for a contact request submission hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom color variables and global styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Utility to smooth-scroll to a section by ID with header offset adjustment.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, breakpoints, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature lists, and state tracking for the Real Estate Landing project.
